description: Copies the specified cluster parameter group.

parameters.name: SourceDBClusterParameterGroupIdentifier
parameters.description: The identifier or Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the source cluster parameter group. Constraints: Must specify a valid cluster parameter group. If the source cluster parameter group is in the same Amazon Web Services Region as the copy, specify a valid parameter group identifier; for example, my-db-cluster-param-group, or a valid ARN. If the source parameter group is in a different Amazon Web Services Region than the copy, specify a valid cluster parameter group ARN; for example, arn:aws:rds:us-east-1:123456789012:sample-cluster:sample-parameter-group.

parameters.name: TargetDBClusterParameterGroupIdentifier
parameters.description: The identifier for the copied cluster parameter group. Constraints: Cannot be null, empty, or blank. Must contain from 1 to 255 letters, numbers, or hyphens. The first character must be a letter. Cannot end with a hyphen or contain two consecutive hyphens. Example: my-cluster-param-group1

parameters.name: TargetDBClusterParameterGroupDescription
parameters.description: A description for the copied cluster parameter group.

parameters.name: Tags
parameters.description: The tags that are to be assigned to the parameter group. (dict) --- Metadata assigned to an Amazon DocumentDB resource consisting of a key-value pair. Key (string) --- The required name of the tag. The string value can be from 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and can't be prefixed with ' aws:' or ' rds:'. The string can contain only the set of Unicode letters, digits, white space, --_', --.', --/', --=', --+', ---' (Java regex: '^([\p{L}\p{Z}\p{N}_.:/=+\-]*)$'). Value (string) --- The optional value of the tag. The string value can be from 1 to 256 Unicode characters in length and can't be prefixed with ' aws:' or ' rds:'. The string can contain only the set of Unicode letters, digits, white space, --_', --.', --/', --=', --+', ---' (Java regex: '^([\p{L}\p{Z}\p{N}_.:/=+\-]*)$').

nested_params.name: Key
nested_params.description: The required name of the tag. The string value can be from 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and can't be prefixed with ' aws:' or ' rds:'. The string can contain only the set of Unicode letters, digits, white space, --_', --.', --/', --=', --+', ---' (Java regex: '^([\p{L}\p{Z}\p{N}_.:/=+\-]*)$').

nested_params.name: Value
nested_params.description: The optional value of the tag. The string value can be from 1 to 256 Unicode characters in length and can't be prefixed with ' aws:' or ' rds:'. The string can contain only the set of Unicode letters, digits, white space, --_', --.', --/', --=', --+', ---' (Java regex: '^([\p{L}\p{Z}\p{N}_.:/=+\-]*)$').

nested_items.name: DBClusterParameterGroup
nested_items.description: Detailed information about a cluster parameter group.

nested_items.name: DBClusterParameterGroupName
nested_items.description: Provides the name of the cluster parameter group.

nested_items.name: DBParameterGroupFamily
nested_items.description: Provides the name of the parameter group family that this cluster parameter group is compatible with.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: Provides the customer-specified description for this cluster parameter group.

nested_items.name: DBClusterParameterGroupArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the cluster parameter group.
